summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5498 for the improvement of West Winthrop Street, from West Hanford Street to a point approximately 303 feet east of 57th Avenue Southwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 70280, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
